entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Line break modes are not working on html text type #24298
  • El sdk microsoft.net.sdk especificado no se pudo encontrar #24297
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Keyboard events are not firing anymore #24295
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Debugger crashes the app on Windows almost immediately in debug configuration #24293

Closed

  • Make WebView available in ScrollView. #14349
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] DatePicker (Format='D') #24296
    community ✨
  • [Testing] moved FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight to appium #24294
    community ✨, testing-green-ci

Updated

  • Fixed FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24212
    community ✨
  • Add styling and Shell to Blazor Hybrid template #24253
    area-templates
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24160
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `WrapperView` #24281
    community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨
  • 899474: Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨
  • [IOS ]Fix border has an unexpected background animation #24227
    community ✨
  • Fix Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24156
    community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix SearchBar presentation taken whole screen size in horizontal screen orientation #24198
    community ✨
  • Defining CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the app #24205
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for CornerRadius of GradientDrawable for ImageButton #24200
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24209
    community ✨
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
